name: @ablestack/reactive-domain-objects
description: A suite of packages to facilitate building and running graphs of Reactive Domain Objects
author: jamshally

scripts.local-publish: yarn run build && lerna run prepublishOnly --stream && yalc publish packages/rdg/dist/src --force && yalc publish packages/rdg-apollo-mobx-connector/dist/src --force
scripts.local-push: yarn run build && lerna run prepublishOnly --stream && yalc push packages/rdg/dist/src --force && yalc push packages/rdg-apollo-mobx-connector/dist/src --force
